# Redis

In memory, key store db.

default 16 databases, and default use first db

default port: 6379

**Commands:**

keys - show all keys in db

flushdb - flush cur db

flushall - flush all dbs

exists x - whether key exists

set key value

get key



Why redis is single threaded?
